title: LF CLASH TEAM
body:
Plat 2, peak Plat 1, can confidently play any position except for Jungle: 
Role Competency goes as follows: 
1. Adc/mid
2. Top
3. Support
4. Jungle
HMU by message, comment or friend request if I can fill a role in your clash team (Looking for primarily gold or plat clash teams).
